backend_llm_notes: Claude Sonnet 4.5 via Cursor Agent Mode - Advanced reasoning and instruction following
original_prompt: Prepare a brief for my upcoming meeting with customer Beta and include a dossier for each customer attendee and the topics they are most interested in. Include a background on their company.

gutts.name: Meeting Details Retrieval
gutts.capability: Get meeting information (attendees list, meeting time, purpose/subject)
gutts.user_goal: Know who's attending, when, and meeting context
gutts.evidence: Retrieved meeting details: attendees from customer Beta, subject, date/time

gutts.name: Company Background Research
gutts.capability: Gather information about customer Beta company (industry, size, products, recent news)
gutts.user_goal: Understand customer's business context and current state
gutts.evidence: Compiled company background: industry, revenue, key products, recent developments

gutts.name: Attendee Identity Resolution
gutts.capability: Identify each customer attendee and their specific roles/titles
gutts.user_goal: Know exactly who you're meeting with and their positions
gutts.evidence: Resolved attendees: John Smith (VP Product), Sarah Chen (Director Engineering)

gutts.name: Individual Dossier Creation
gutts.capability: For each attendee, compile background, role, interaction history, and context
gutts.user_goal: Personalized context for each individual attendee
gutts.evidence: Created dossiers with background, role, past interactions, preferences

gutts.name: Topic Interest Analysis
gutts.capability: Identify topics each attendee cares about based on communication history, role, and context
gutts.user_goal: Discuss what matters most to each person
gutts.evidence: VP Product: roadmap integration; Director Eng: API performance, scalability

gutts.name: Relationship History Compilation
gutts.capability: Summarize past interactions, deals, support issues, and relationship context with customer
gutts.user_goal: Aware of relationship history and ongoing context
gutts.evidence: History: signed contract Q2, 3 support escalations, renewal upcoming Q4

gutts.name: Relevant Content Gathering
gutts.capability: Find related materials (proposals, presentations, technical docs, case studies)
gutts.user_goal: Have supporting materials ready for discussion
gutts.evidence: Gathered: recent proposal, technical integration guide, relevant case study

gutts.name: Brief Document Assembly
gutts.capability: Compile all information into structured, comprehensive prep brief
gutts.user_goal: Complete brief ready for meeting preparation
gutts.evidence: Generated brief: company background, attendee dossiers, topics, history, materials

notes: Generated by Claude Sonnet 4.5 - Matches reference decomposition of 8 GUTTs
